    I am a Ph.D. student in Information Technology at the George Mason University, advised by Lei Yang and Weiwen Jiang. My research interest includes edge machine learning, AI4Science on edge, effiencient AI. I have published 10+ conference and journal papers with total google scholar citations . I also collaborate with [Youzuo Lin] (https://sites.google.com/site/youzuolin044/home) from University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and Los Alamos National Lab closely.

    I graduated from School of Information and Software Engineering, University of Electronic Science and Technology of China with a bachelor‚Äôs degree and a master‚Äôs degree, advised by Jinyu Zhan.
